case.title: Tired of Being Alone... - 35 (Smithtown)
case.text:
I am tired of being alone. Looking to simply spend time with someone. Go out and enjoy each other's company. Possibly FWB if there is an attraction.
Please SUFFOLK COUNTY ONLY. Don't waste your time if you are out of county because I WILL NEVER RESPOND. Also, in your response please put your age, location and a little about yourself.
Thanks!! :)
